title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, installable via npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for use in LangChain chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama, packaged as a Docker container.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama, published to Maven Central for easy JVM integration.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem that wraps the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI tool written in Go that adds interactive model management and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as GitHub-Copilot-like suggestions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node that integrates Ollama models into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and ASP.NET Core minimal APIs.
